body:
Since we moved repository we started missing the commit status from [codecov.io](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/commit-status). 

As far as I can tell we are still uploading the data correctly, and getting the coverage reports for both [develop](https://codecov.io/gh/spack/spack) and [PRs](https://codecov.io/gh/spack/spack/pulls), the only thing that seems to be missing is the commit status report on the PR page. I checked briefly the configuration we have, and it seems in order to me, so I am not sure where could be the problem.
title: codecov commit status is missing
